item.title: 2019 THU Big Data Preliminary
item.description: I participated in the 2019 Donghae University Big Data Competition. In this article, I will show waht kind of the problem we should do and how I finish the work. ※There is contest Description: 1.訓練數據(用於建立模型) 此數據為建模用，數據為熱壓爐成化加

item.title: CRE Bacteria Data Analysis
item.description: 在這個資料中，我們有兩種細菌。前面的46個觀察值是CRE，後面的49個則不是。 我們希望將資料分類為是否為 CRE。Peak是蛋白質的名稱，而P

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
